statements: SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT stock_symbol, revenue, expenses, profit FROM financial_data WHERE profit > 10000;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, stock_symbol FROM financial_data ORDER BY stock_symbol ASC;
SELECT id, revenue, expenses, profit FROM financial_data WHERE revenue > expenses ORDER BY profit DESC;
SELECT id, stock_symbol, revenue, expenses, profit, timestamp FROM financial_data WHERE revenue > 100000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT stock_symbol, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM financial_data GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING total_revenue > 500000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, MAX(profit) AS max_profit FROM financial_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT id, stock_symbol, profit FROM financial_data WHERE expenses < 50000 AND profit > 20000 ORDER BY profit DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT stock_symbol, AVG(profit) AS avg_profit FROM financial_data WHERE stock_symbol IN ('AAPL', 'GOOGL', 'AMZN') GROUP BY stock_symbol ORDER BY avg_profit DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data;
SELECT variable_name, value FROM financial_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT variable1, variable2, correlation_coefficient FROM correlations ORDER BY correlation_coefficient DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE value > 1000;
SELECT variable_name AS Name, value AS Amount FROM financial_data ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT variable_name, value FROM financial_data WHERE variable_name LIKE 'rev%' AND value < 5000;
SELECT variable1, variable2, correlation_coefficient FROM correlations WHERE correlation_coefficient > 0.8 ORDER BY variable1, variable2 ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE variable_name = 'expenses' OR variable_name = 'revenue' ORDER BY id ASC, value DESC;
SELECT MAX(value) AS max_value, MIN(value) AS min_value FROM financial_data;
SELECT * FROM financial_data;
SELECT ticker_symbol, closing_price FROM financial_data ORDER BY closing_price DESC;
SELECT date, volume FROM financial_data WHERE volume > 1000000;
SELECT sector_name, industry FROM sector_data ORDER BY sector_name;
SELECT variable1, variable2, correlation_coefficient FROM correlation_results WHERE correlation_coefficient > 0.7;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE ticker_symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT ticker_symbol, closing_price, volume FROM financial_data WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY closing_price DESC
SELECT sector_name, industry, COUNT(*) AS total_sectors FROM sector_data GROUP BY sector_name, industry ORDER BY total_sectors DESC
SELECT * FROM correlation_results WHERE correlation_coefficient > 0.5 ORDER BY correlation_coefficient DESC

SELECT financial_data.ticker_symbol, financial_data.volume, correlation_results.correlation_coefficient FROM financial_data INNER JOIN correlation_results ON financial_data.ticker_symbol = correlation_results.variable1 ORDER BY correlation_coefficient DESC
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT stock_symbol, price FROM financial_data ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM stock_info WHERE exchange = 'NASDAQ';
SELECT stock_symbol1, stock_symbol2, correlation_coefficient FROM correlation_data WHERE correlation_coefficient > 0.9;
SELECT date, close_price FROM historic_prices WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, date, stock_symbol, price, volume FROM financial_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT company_name, industry, exchange FROM stock_info WHERE industry='Technology' ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT stock_symbol1, stock_symbol2, correlation_coefficient FROM correlation_data WHERE correlation_coefficient > 0.8 ORDER BY correlation_coefficient DESC;
SELECT date, stock_symbol, open_price, close_price FROM historic_prices WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY stock_symbol ASC, date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, date, stock_symbol, close_price, high_price FROM historic_prices WHERE close_price < high_price AND date >= '2021-10-01' ORDER BY close_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM financial_variables;
SELECT variable_name, value FROM financial_variables WHERE value > 100;
SELECT variable_name, correlation_value FROM correlations ORDER BY correlation_value DESC;
SELECT time_stamp, variable1_value FROM dataset1 WHERE variable1_value < 50;
SELECT * FROM dataset2 WHERE variable2_value BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM financial_variables ORDER BY variable_name DESC;
SELECT id, correlation_value FROM correlations WHERE correlation_value > 0.8;
SELECT variable1, variable2, correlation_value FROM correlations WHERE variable1='X' OR variable2='Y';
SELECT time_stamp, variable1_value FROM dataset1 WHERE variable1_value < 100 ORDER BY time_stamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM dataset2 WHERE time_stamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
